ROOT.SelectReportList: select r.*,(select right_type from smartreport.TB_SYS_USER_REPORT ur where ur.usernum={0} and ur.report_id=r.report_id) right_type,d.dir_name from tb_report r join TB_DIRINFO d on (d.dir_id=r.dir_id) where ({1}=-1 or {1}=1 or d.dir_id={1}) and r.report_name like '%{2}%'
ROOT.SelectTableColumn: select c.*,t.tbldesc from tb_datacolumn c join tb_datatable t on (c.tblname=t.tblname) where c.coldesc is not null and c.coldesc<>''
